Text: Note to Work Friendspst Forwarded by Karla HeskethFieldMarketingUSTRAABB on PM Dear Enron Friends Some of you may know that I have been recently diagnosed with nonsmall cell lung cancer This Wednesday May I will have this cancerous tumor removed Hopefully that will be it and all will return to normal shortly and you will see me again soon It is my understanding that I will be in the hospital for about week and they say I will be down for another six weeks after that Apparently they have not dealt with anyone that has the same tenacity and inability to sit still as me At any rate Ill be out for a while During my absense my assistant Karla Hesketh will continue to do the same wonderful job that she has done for all of us throughout the years I have a very good friend John Vollen who is a rep for ABB out in the Great Northwest that has graciously volunteered to come to Houston for days a week for as long as necessary to help us with the Enron business Randy Hayes will also help John and will provide introductions when necessary and appropriate Please welcome John as you have me in the past You will find that he is eager to help and very capable He has been in sales for ten years and is a graduate engineer Just dont get to used to him as I will return After I get home Ill call to check on all of you and make sure that all is well with business and you personally I am very grateful to have the Enron account and I have grown close to many of you and enjoy working on the interesting and yes sometimes challenging projects that we are faced with Again please continue to work with John and Karla as you have worked with me in the past Ill keep you updated as to my progress Best Regards Mike

Enron Corrected Option Letter Information for Contract Purposes LMSK Cc Forwarded by Karla HeskethFieldMarketingUSTRAABB on AM BenKayKathy Attached is the revised pricing for the types of transformers for the LMSK contract along with Schedule A B and C reflecting the latest transformer designs This information is for incorporation into the final contract See attached file ABBoptionmayrevdoc Please call if you have any questions Mike will be at Enron tomorrow should you need to discuss this final pricing and design information with him Regards Karla Hesketh Karla HeskethABB Ph Fx ABBoptionmayrevdoc
